name: Tower Defense (Himali Kothari)
description:
Parsecs Defenders is a thrilling sci-fi, space-themed tower defense. To win the game, the player must survive a set number of enemy waves without their main space-base, known as the Lunar Station, from being destroyed. Waves of enemy crafts rapidly try to destroy the player’s base as the player actively builds protective towers and mines resources to expand their empire. These resources are used to build new and advanced space station protection systems. Do you have what it takes to captain the Lunar Station to safety?

Other Developers: Edgar Moreno, Peter Revington, Mitkumar Malavia, Cameron Edwards
